Posts.Content: CancerCrusher wrote: I just finished week three of radiation and will have my last day on Monday. This past week my throat has started hurting, The area being treated is my neck bones so my doctor warned me about the throat pain before. Im drinking a lot of coffee, tea and soup to help it. Im not worried cus I know its a normal side effect but I am just wondering how long I should expect the pain and difficulty speaking? I don't want to wait. Addie the Cancer Crusher! Dx 4/2001, 2cm, Stage IV Surgery 4/1/2001 Lymph node removal: Right, Sentinel, Underarm/Axillary; Mastectomy: Right Chemotherapy 4/2/2001 Xeloda (capecitabine) Hormonal Therapy Aromasin (exemestane) Radiation Therapy Bone Log in to post a reply
